thread.title: Great Hotel Great Location Extraordinary Service
thread.title_full: Great Hotel Great Location Extraordinary Service - Review of Hotel Eclat Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: KaiserBrie
title: Great Hotel Great Location Extraordinary Service
text: After The meeting over,I walked around in shopping area,I was attracted by the big screen on the left side of the building front door,The manager Chris took me looked around this hotel,I wasn't sure what to expect with all the art pieces,but they really do pull it off rather impressively with a variety of sculptures and paintings.I'm highly recommend this hotel to my colleagues who will travel to Beijing.
